name: Trash Panda (sirpunchkill, J33NO, NotedNuance, jstock19, rcub)
name_original: Trash Panda (sirpunchkill, J33NO, NotedNuance, jstock19, rcub)
description:
Keyboard Inputs

Pause Game : P

Move Left : A

Move Right : D

Jump : Space Bar

Attack : Left Mouse Button

Glide : (Hold) Space Bar

Controller recommended.
